text: Babagirira ubugugu maze bagerwaho n’ubwoba (bw’intambara) ukabona bakureba bakanaguzwa amaso nk’urimo gusamba; ariko iyo ubwoba bushize, babasesereza bakoresheje indimi zabo zityaye. Bagira ubugugu bwo gukora ibyiza. Abo ntibigeze bemera, bityo ibikorwa byabo Allah yabigize impfabusa. Kandi ibyo kuri Allah biroroshye
